name: El Minero
description:
El Minero


Explore, jump and hop inside an underground mine in this 2d hand drawn platformer.

Not looking for treasure nor ghosts nor idols.
It's just your day job, full of danger and exploration.
Try heavy duty machinery to solve short platforming puzzles.
Be careful of the environment.
Nothing is out to kill you, but accidents can happen.

Bespoke soundtrack by Tokyo Based Music Producer gh0stpops.
Hand drawn Graphics in the style of Mexican "moneros" (cartoonists).
Environment Inspired by stories and experiences of real miners.
Beginner friendly, laid back experience for all ages.
